CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family , "Custom Development" ), ISPICKVAL( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family , "Consulting" ), ISPICKVAL( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family , "Project Management" ), ISPICKVAL( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family , "User Adoption" )),Opportunity.CloseDate + 60, IF ( ISPICKVAL( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family , "Support"), Opportunity.CloseDate + 30, IF ( ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Family , "Custom Dev"), Opportunity.CloseDate + 60, Opportunity.CloseDate)))
CustomField.label: Invoice/Project Start Date
